body.name: CAMECHO Dual Dash Cam 1080P Front and Inside Dash Camera for Cars 2 Channel Dashcam, 3.16" IPS Screen, IR Night Vision, Loop Recording, 24hr Parking Mode, Car Camera with 32GB TF Card Driving Recorder
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 1 min
features: 【1080P Dual Dash Cam Front and Inside】The dash cam has a built-in dual-channel system, providing a 150° front camera and cabin inside camera, the cabin camera can be rotated 180°. Featuring a 3.16-inch IPS screen, dash cam front and inside simultaneously capture every detail of the front of the road and the interior of the cabin in a dual screen.

【Infrared Night Vision】The dashboard front camera features infrared night vision for optimal performance in low light conditions, ensuring full HD capture in both day and night. The interior facing camera utilizes 3 unique infrared LED fill lights to accurately capture the driver and passengers even in total darkness.

【Looping Recording】Seamless Loop Recording to continuously record and overwrites the oldest footage with the newest upon filling a card to capacity. (Support up to 64GB Micro SD card) (32GB SD card is included)

【G-sensor and Parking Monitor】The dash cam will automatically powers on and starts recording when detects a collision or bump happens. 24 hours parking monitor available to record continuously for 24 hours with time lapse function at parking mode. Please note that a hardware kit is needed.

【Easy to Install and Set Up】Connect dashboard camera with cigarette lighter, easily and securely mount to the windshield in seconds with the included suction cups. Ideal for ride-hailing, taxi drivers, uber, rideshare, Lyft drivers, commuters and families. Suitable for 12V vehicles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dual Dash Cam Front and Inside Note: Voltage: DC 12VBuilt-in 150mAh battery is just for emergency recording and save settings. Please keep the dashcam plugged in always, the dual dash cam will shut down after 5 seconds when there is no external power connection.Do not leave the cars camera in direct sunlight for a long period of time or where the temperature could go above 170°F (75°C). Brings you clear video, recording your wonderful trips and ensuring your driving safe and joyful Features ►3.16 Inch IPS 1080P HD monitor with dual dash camera►HD Front camera with super night vision and 150°wide angle►Cabin inside camera with 3 IR Light to capture the driver and passengers►Dual channel for front/interior view, support split screen to view at the same time►Support loop recording, auto cover previous video►32GB TF card and saving evidence to protect your right►24h parking monitoring and gravity sensor functions►Easy installation, just plug and play►Wide compatibility, such as cars, trucks, RVs, trailers, motorcycle, Jeeps, vans, SUVs, etc.

Dashcam Front and Inside Dash Cam Front and Inside Includes dual dash cam front and inside cameras to monitor the road in front of and cabin inside of the car simultaneously, eliminating blind spots in your field of view. Drive safely and get great protection. Front camera: FHD 1080P, 150° wide viewing angleInterior Camera: FHD 1080P, 3-LED light Super Night Vision With super night vision technology and 3 unique infrared LED fill lights, the dash camera offers clear nighttime shooting possibilities and license plates can be clearly recorded, especially in low light or backlight conditions. Built In G-sensor When the built-in gravity sensor detects a sudden shake or collision or crash, the dashcam will automatically record and lock the footage as evidence of accident and these videos will not be overwritten.

Seamless Loop Recording Never worry about running out of storage space. Loop recording will automatically overwrite the earliest clip with current video when the SD card is full. Allows continuous recording without missing a moment. Locked footage will not be overwritten. 3.16 Inch IPS LCD Screen Featuring a 3.16-inch IPS display and updated Full HD 1080P resolution with better viewing angles and color accuracy, the dash camera captures every road and license plate detail to provide you with the best visual experience. Dash camera with 32GB TF Card This dual dash cam package comes with a 32GB TF card, no need to spend extra money to buy it. Save worry and trouble. Locked filed cannot be deleted automatically, so please format the card monthly.Support micro SD card with a maximum storage capacity of 64GB

Specifications Display size: 3.16 inch screenWorking Power (DCV): 12VUSB interface: Mini USBVideo format: MOVPicture format: JPEGImage sensors: 1/4" color SensorMinimum illumination: <0.5AGC: AutoWhite Balance: AutoEffective Pixels: 1296P、1080P、720PVideo Output: 1.0Vp-p,75Electronic Shutter: 1/60(NTSC)-1/10000SS/N ratio: Better Than 48dbWaterproof Class: IP 66Lens Angle: 150°Working humidity: RH95%Power interface: DC 5V/1.5ACurrent frequency: 50 / 60HzPull back video: SupportSupport TF card: 64G (maximum)Multilingual settings

Package Included 1 x Dash Camera 1 x 32GB TF Card 1 x Car charger 1 x User Manual Easy to Install This dashcam designed with 3.16 inch compact size will not block your sight and safer option whilst driving. Compact design will not attract attention and block the view.The installation process is very simple, wipe the windshield clean and choose the most suitable place for installation. Most people choose to mount the front camera near the rear view mirror and the rear camera in a location near the license plate.Plug the cigarette lighter power cable firmly into the car's cigarette lighter socket, and when you start the engine, the drive camera will automatically turn on and start recording. Truly "plug and play". No setup required for a hassle-free driving experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars nice dash cam
reviews.reviewText: With so many bad drivers out there, I thought it was time to possibly protect myself in case of an accident by installing dash cams. I really like how this one has the dual cameras - one for the road ahead and one for the inside of the vehicle. This way, if something should happen when my teenager is driving, I will be able to tell if it was in any way his fault. The cameras work perfectlyy and was very easy to get set up in the car. The video playback is nice and clear too. I think this is a really nice set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This really works well. It was pretty easy to setup. Nice and clear recording. Really like this
